title: The Marco Polo: Queen of the seas
creator_credit: Sam Grana, ONF | NFB and Roger Hart
brief_description: For lovers of ships, particularly the golden age of sailing ships, “The Marco Polo: Queen of the seas” is a fascinating documentary. The ship began its career as a timber freight carrier but became a passenger ship which carried emigrants to Australia. Produced by the acclaimed National Film Board of Canada, this program uses archival footage and dramatisations to recreate the era.
